Payments & banking services app #Zeux has teamed with #IOTA to create a system that will allow users to use MIOTA tokens as payment with merchants that accept #Apple Pay & #Samsung Pay. Zeux will launch in #Europe this April & in the #US in 2020 at hundreds of merchants! #crypto  https://t.co/A9ZUjNBxmo
